ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:50:44 [Issue ID 4000-162635] urn:comicvine:4000-162635 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 15:08:01. [Issue ID 671613]
ComicInfo.Summary: War of the Witchblades Part 4: Dani is wounded and Sabine has fatally stabbed Sara with her spear as Patrick tries to protect them both from the Angelus warriors. Sabine tells Patrick that he can choose one of the Witchblade bearers to keep but the other is going with her. He picks Sara. As Sabine flies off with Danielle, Patrick gives Sara mouth to mouth and is relieved as the Witchblade heals her and she wakes up. When Dani awakens, Sabine begins to talk her into going after Sara and taking back the "evil" half of the Witchblade. Tau'ma confronts the Curator.
ComicInfo.Tags: Detective Gleason,The Angelus,New York State,Julie Pezzini,Sabine,Danielle Baptiste,Angelus Warriors,Witchblade,Tau'ma,Curator,Sara Pezzini,Hope Pezzini,New York City,War Of The Witchblades
ComicInfo.Title: War of the Witchblades Part 4
